description_en: Lookup table, to be left-joined against variable name in the other Money and Banking datasets if specified.
description_ms: Jadual carian, untuk dipadankan (left-join) dengan nama pembolehubah dalam set data Wang dan Perbankan sekiranya diperlukan.
methodology_en: This lookup table is not part of any standardised data dictionary; it was custom-made to serve the datasets on money and banking made available via data.gov.my only.
methodology_ms: Jadual carian ini bukan sebahagian daripada mana-mana _dictionary_ data; ia dihasilkan khas untuk memenuhi keperluan set data tentang wang dan perbankan yang dibekalkan melalui data.gov.my sahaja.

fields.name: variable
fields.description_en: [String] Name of the variable as contained within the dataset
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Nama pembolehubah seperti yang terkandung dalam set data

fields.name: variable_en
fields.description_en: [String] Definition of the variable in English

fields.name: variable_bm
fields.description_en: [String] Definition of the variable in Malay
